alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 06 at 3:01AM CST until February 06 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces and Inland San Patricio Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
